recipe.title: Fresh Berries with Ricotta Cream
ingredients: 2 cups reduced-fat ricotta (1 gram fat per ounce)
4 edible flowers, such as pansies or nasturtiums (optional)
instructions: Purée strawberries with apple juice in a blender until smooth. Spoon equal amounts of berry sauce into 4 cocktail or parfait glasses. Combine ricotta cream ingredients in a blender or food processor. Process until mixture is smooth, about 30 seconds. Spoon 1/4 of the ricotta cream into each glass and top with 1/4 cup strawberry slices. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Garnish each with a mint sprig and an edible flower, if desired, before serving.
